title: Digital Fury Gaming
body:
Hello,
 Digital fury Gaming is currently looking for players from the range of silver 1 to gold 1 to join our teams as a permanent, we are currently looking for all roles, but willing to take in subs, we're also looking into refilling our diamond  team, for this team we're happy to take in from plat2 to challenger and all roles are currently available with two spots for subs
I am also personally looking for coaches and managers that will help me run the teams with their chosen team captains and help plain out scrims, team comps, and help with drafting. if you feel like you would like to join the teams of digital fury gaming, or perhaps
help as a manager or request for the coaching spots, feel free to  add me in game @ Shouri

replies.body: Hello, Plat 2 Support main I've sent you a friend request in game.
added you in game just need the discord link from u
